subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic was uncharacteristically passive in the third and fourth sets of a loss to Kei Nishikori in the U.S. Open semifinals.
snippet: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic was uncharacteristically passive in the third and fourth sets of a loss to Kei Nishikori in the U.S. Open semifinals.
